statements: UPDATE energy_efficiency_initiatives SET energy_savings = 500.25, initiative_name = 'LED Lighting Upgrade' WHERE community_id = 1;
UPDATE energy_efficiency_initiatives SET start_date = '2022-03-15', end_date = '2022-08-30', impact_on_sustainability = 'Reduced carbon footprint' WHERE initiative_name = 'Solar Panel Installation';

UPDATE energy_efficiency_initiatives
SET energy_savings = 2500.75,
impact_on_sustainability = 'Significant impact on carbon footprint'
WHERE community_id = 123 AND initiative_name = 'LED Lighting Upgrade';

UPDATE energy_efficiency_initiatives
SET end_date = '2022-12-31',
start_date = '2021-01-01'
WHERE impact_on_sustainability = 'Positive impact on environment' AND energy_savings > 2000;
UPDATE initiatives SET end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE communities SET sustainability_goal = 'Reduce Carbon Footprint' WHERE community_id = 3;
UPDATE initiatives SET energy_saved = 500 WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE communities SET location = 'New Location', sustainability_goal = 'Green Living' WHERE community_id = 2;
UPDATE community_energy_initiatives SET estimated_energy_savings = 15000 WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE initiative_participants SET role = 'Volunteer' WHERE participant_id = 3;
UPDATE community_energy_initiatives SET estimated_energy_savings = 50000 WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET consumption_kwh = 2500, consumption_date = '2023-10-15' WHERE data_id = 3;
UPDATE community_energy_initiatives SET location='New York' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE energy_consumption SET electricity_consumed=500.25, water_consumed=100.75 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE community_energy_initiatives SET location = 'New York' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE energy_consumption SET electricity_consumed = 350.25, water_consumed = 120.50 WHERE community_id = 3 AND consumption_date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE communities SET region='East' WHERE community_id=1;
UPDATE initiatives_metrics SET metric_value=150.25 WHERE metric_id=3;
UPDATE communities SET region = 'North' WHERE community_id = 1;
UPDATE initiatives SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
